postBootScript: yum install -y wget;wget  http://geni-images.renci.org/images/kthare10/scripts/mobius_start_up_v1.1.sh -O /root/mobius_start_up.sh; sh /root/mobius_start_up.sh WORKFLOW;git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/Mobius-scripts.git /root/Mobius-scripts; cp /root/Mobius-scripts/scripts/master_submit.sh /root/master_submit.sh;sed -i 's/NETWORK_INTERFACE=/NETWORK_INTERFACE=REPLACEIP/g' /root/master_submit.sh;echo 'net.ipv4.ip_forward=1' >> /etc/sysctl.conf; sysctl -p;sh /root/master_submit.sh
